sense.def:
Kdor je
sophisticated
, pozna kulturo, modo in druge zadeve, ki veljajo za družbeno pomembne.

seg.quote: ...a glossy magazine for today's sophisticated woman.

sense.def:
Naprava, ki je
sophisticated
, ima lastnosti, ki so rezultat sodobne tehnike in znanja in jih druge naprave nimajo.

seg.quote: These planes are among the most sophisticated aircraft now being manufactured.
